name: Vega Protocol
intro: Decentralized network for margined financial products
introduce: Vega Protocol is a decentralized network for margined financial products. As a sovereign blockchain designed specifically for trading derivatives, Vega has developed novel approaches to fairness, risk monitoring and capital efficiency, while mirroring a centralized experience with its high performance. Permissionless market creation allows users to launch all sorts of new markets, in terms of product, asset, and settlement, by customizing modules at different layers of abstraction.
